Begin Form
    RecordSelectors = NotDefault
    OrderByOn = NotDefault
    AllowDesignChanges = NotDefault
    DefaultView =0
    TabularFamily =0
    PictureAlignment =2
    DatasheetGridlinesBehavior =3
    Cycle =1
    GridX =24
    GridY =24
    Width =9960
    DatasheetFontHeight =10
    ItemSuffix =50
    Left =1110
    Top =585
    Right =11325
    Bottom =6210
    DatasheetGridlinesColor =12632256
    BeforeDelConfirm ="[Event Procedure]"
    AfterDelConfirm ="[Event Procedure]"
    Filter ="((([xChairs Edit Add Delete Assign].TYPE=\"P\"))) And ([xChairs Edit Add Delete "
        "Assign].Chairs_STATUS=\"A\")"
    OrderBy ="CHAIRNUM"
    RecSrcDt = Begin
        0x8804663051f2e240
    End
    OnDirty ="[Event Procedure]"
    GUID = Begin
        0x64598dca86adee489b9f207eb7640da4
    End
    RecordSource ="SELECT Chairs.CHAIRNUM, Persons.LNAME, Persons.FNAME, Persons.MI, Chairs.JUN, Ch"
        "airs.TYPE, Chairs.STATUS AS Chairs_STATUS, Chairs.LOCATION, Chairs.GROUP, Chairs"
        ".PRIORITY, Chairs.ASSISTING, Judges.STATUS AS Judges_STATUS, Judges.DEGREE, Judg"
        "es.MAJOR, Judges.EXPER, Persons.HOME_PHONE, Persons.WORK_PHONE, Persons.EXTENSIO"
        "N, Persons.SALUTATION, Persons.EMAIL, Persons.CELL_PHONE, Judges.COMMENT AS JCom"
        "ment, Chairs.NOTE AS ChrNote, Persons.COMMENTS AS PerComments, Persons.TP, Perso"
        "ns.LAST_CHG, Persons.FAX_PHONE FROM Persons RIGHT JOIN (Judges RIGHT JOIN Chairs"
        " ON Judges.JUN=Chairs.JUN) ON Persons.PID=Judges.PID ORDER BY Chairs.CHAIRNUM; "
    OnCurrent ="[Event Procedure]"
    OnDelete ="[Event Procedure]"
    BeforeUpdate ="[Event Procedure]"
    OnOpen ="[Event Procedure]"
    OnClose ="[Event Procedure]"
    DatasheetFontName ="Arial"

                        " [CHAIRNUM] AS PChr FROM Persons RIGHT JOIN (Judges RIGHT JOIN Chairs ON Judges."

                        "irs ON Judges.JUN=Chairs.JUN) ON Persons.PID=Judges.PID WHERE (((Chairs.TYPE)=\""
                        "\"P\"\")) ORDER BY Persons.LNAME; \";\"Persons\";\"Judges\";\"Chairs\";\"\""

CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private JudgeTypesRS As Recordset
Private HoldCRCState As Boolean ' current state of 'Confirm Record Change' option
Private ctlPrevFocus As Control 'Used to reset focus after button push
Private criteria As String      'Query SQL Strings
Private msg As String           'Message Box Prompts
Private Title As String         'Title of this form
Private DidDelete As Boolean    'Deleted a Record from Form recordset
Private DidAdd As Boolean       'A New Record has been added to Form Recordset
Private TouchedUndo As Boolean  'The Undo Button was touched by mouse
Private DeleteLast As Boolean   'The Delete button deleted the last record
                                'Used to avoid moving to add new record
Private InAdd As Boolean        'In Add new record mode
Private DoCrLf As Boolean       'May be used by timer to exit a combo box
Private PrevPrimChair As Long   ' CHAIRNUM of Chair being replaced else 0
Private LastSTATUS As Variant
Private LastTYPE As Variant
Private tCN As Long
Private TLN As String
Private TFN As String

Private Function DoReassign(StatusChanged As Boolean) As Boolean
 'This Routine is the key to Chairs Set up and Changes. It not only
 ' documents, but executes the ACTIONS required for changes to the
 ' Chairs Table (Changes in this Form)
 ' There are Several Ways to change Chairs and Chairs assignments.
 '  1. Just leave the CHAIRNUMs the same and change JUNs for Prim and Assistants
 '     Benefit: Few Changes in 'JudgeTypes' Table, ASSISTING, GROUP, PRIORITY
 '     Bad Feature: The Chairs Table does not contain Inactive Chairs and
 '                  All History of which Judges did which Chair jobs is lost
 '                  From Year to Year
 '  2. Keep Lots of Chairs in the Table, and reassign JCATS and reset ASSISTING
 '     each time there is any changes in STATUS and/or Chair TYPE.
 '     Benefits:  All Past, Potential, and Current Chairs are kept in Chairs
 '     Bad Feature: Any Change essentially requires a review of all other Chairs
 '                  and Assignments and often requires Changes in 'JudgeTypes'
 '                  table and changes to ASSISTING for several records.
 ' WE HAVE USED METHOD 2. FOR THIS FAIR AND THIS FORM. To help the user through
 ' the changes, the form does a lot of work when possible.  If not, messages
 ' will help guide the user through the changes.
 ' This table lists WHAT THE USER DOES and the follow up 'Action(s) required
 '   (The followup action detail is listed after the table)
 '
 'WHAT THE USER DOES                    WhatChges TYPE STATUS ACTION
 '1.Set Inactive Assistant Active              st    a      a     AS,CJ
 '2.Set Active Primary to Assistant            ty    a      a     JB,AS
 '3.Set Active Assistant Inactive              st    a            none
 '4.Set Inactive Primary to Inactive Assistant ty    a            none
 '5.Set Inactive Primary Active                st    p      a     JM,AC,CJ
 '6.Set Active Assistant to Active Primary     ty    p      a     JM,AB,AC
 '7.Set Active Primary to Inactive Primary     st    p            JB
 '8.Set Inactive Assistant to Inactive Primary ty    p            none
 '9.Entering New Inactive Chair either type    ty    a,p          none
 'Entering New Active Chair (same as 1. or 5.)
 'Actions Detail  NOTE: USER INPUTS Prev Prim Chair.
 ' IS - Ask if this change will replace a current Primary Chair
 ' JC - Check Judge Status and if Active warn user.
 ' AC - Change All ASSISTING = Prev Prim Chair To: Current Prim Chair
 ' AS - Verify/Set Current ASSISTING to An Active Prim Chair (Manual Only)
 ' AB - Set Current ASSISTING to NULL
 ' JM - Move Grp, Prior., JCats From: Prev Prim Chair To Current Prim Chair
 '      &  Set Prev Prim Chair Inactive (leaving Group and Priority)
 ' JS - Verify/Set Current Prim Chair Grp,Prior.,JCATS (New setup, manual?)
 ' JB - Msg, Best to set Other Prim Chair Active(esle clrgrpjcats)
 '
  On Error GoTo SubError
 DoReassign = True ' assume ok
 '
 '1.Set Inactive Assistant Active              st    a      a     AS,CJ
  If StatusChanged = True And Me.Type <> "P" And _
                           Me.Chairs_STATUS = "A" Then
    If SubAS = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    If SubCJ = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    DoReassign = True
    Exit Function
  End If
 '
 '2.Set Active Primary to Assistant            ty    a      a     JB,AS
  If StatusChanged = False And Me.Type <> "P" And _
                           Me.Chairs_STATUS = "A" Then
    If SubJB = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    If SubAS = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    DoReassign = True
    Exit Function
  End If
 '
 '5.Set Inactive Primary Active                st    p      a     JM,AC,CJ
  If StatusChanged = True And Me.Type = "P" And _
                           Me.Chairs_STATUS = "A" Then
    If SubJM = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    If SubAC = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    If SubCJ = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    DoReassign = True
    Exit Function
  End If
 '
 '6.Set Active Assistant to Active Primary     ty    p      a     JM,AB,AC
  If StatusChanged = False And Me.Type = "P" And _
                           Me.Chairs_STATUS = "A" Then
    If SubJM = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    If SubAB = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    If SubAC = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    DoReassign = True
    Exit Function
  End If
 '
 '7.Set Active Primary to Inactive Primary     st    p      n     JB
  If StatusChanged = True And Me.Type = "P" And _
                          IsNull(Me.Chairs_STATUS) Then
    If SubJB = False Then DoReassign = False: Exit Function
    DoReassign = True
    Exit Function
  End If
 '
 '3.Set Active Assistant Inactive              st    a      n     none
 '4.Set Inactive Primary to Inactive Assistant ty    a      n     none
 '8.Set Inactive Assistant to Inactive Primary ty    p      n     none
 '9.Entering New Inactive Chair either type    ty    a,p    n     none
  If IsNull(Me.Chairs_STATUS) And Not (StatusChanged And Me.Type = "P") Then
     'Or (Me.NewRecord And IsNull(Me.Chairs_STATUS) And _
     'StatusChanged = False) Then
    'MsgBox "No Addition Actions Necessary now"
    DoReassign = True  ' no action at this time. No action if Stats left null
    Exit Function
  End If
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Function
' CJ - Check Judge Status and if Active warn user.
Private Function SubCJ() As Boolean
  On Error GoTo SubError
  SubCJ = True
  'MsgBox "Check Judge Status Active"
  If Me.Judges_STATUS = "A" Then
     MsgBox "NOTICE: Judges Status is Active" & vbCrLf & _
           "You may want to clear it soon."
  End If
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Function
' AC - Change All ASSISTING = Prev Prim Chair To: Current Prim Chair
Private Function SubAC() As Boolean
  On Error GoTo SubError
  SubAC = True
  If PrevPrimChair = 0 Then
    MsgBox "Remember: Set applicable Assistant Chairs 'ASSISTING'" & vbCrLf & _
           " assignment to this new or replacement Primary Chair."
    Exit Function
  Else   ' Do auto action
    'MsgBox "Auto Action: Will Change Assistants!" & vbCrLf & _
    '       "From Previous Primary Chair to New Primary Chair", , Title
    ' --------- DO THE WORK --------------------
    Dim rs As Object
    Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
    rs.MoveFirst
    Do While Not rs.EOF
      If rs!ASSISTING = PrevPrimChair Then
        rs.Edit
        rs!ASSISTING = Me.CHAIRNUM
        rs.Update
      End If
      rs.MoveNext
    Loop
    'Me.Refresh
  End If
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Function
' AS - Verify/Set Current ASSISTING to An Active Prim Chair (Manual Only)
Private Function SubAS() As Boolean
  On Error GoTo SubError
  SubAS = True
  If Me.Type <> "M" Then
  MsgBox "Remember to Verify or Set 'ASSISTING' for this Chair"
  End If
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Function
' AB - Set Current ASSISTING to NULL
Private Function SubAB() As Boolean
  On Error GoTo SubError
  SubAB = True
  'MsgBox "Auto Action: Will Set Current ASSISTING Blank"
  '----  DO THE WORK ------
  Me.cbASSISTING = Null
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Function
' JM - Move Grp, Prior., JCats From: Prev Prim Chair To Current Prim Chair
'      &  Set Prev Prim Chair Inactive (leaving Group and Priority)
Private Function SubJM() As Boolean
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Dim workdone As Boolean
  workdone = False
  SubJM = True
  msg = "AUTO ASSIGN THIS CHAIR AS SUBSTITUTE/REPLACEMENT?" & vbCrLf & _
        " (Move ALL DATA from the 'Replaced Chair')"
  If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbNo Then
     MsgBox "You must MANUALLY Set GROUP, PRIORITY, and JCATs for this Chair"
     PrevPrimChair = 0
  Else ' yes do automatic assigns
    Dim userinput As Long
redoinput:
    userinput = _
       InputBox("Enter CHAIRNUM of Primary Chair being replaced", Title)
    ' Check this is a real primary chair
    Dim rs As Object
    Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
    rs.FindFirst "TYPE = 'P' AND CHAIRNUM = " & userinput
    If rs.NoMatch Then
      MsgBox "Not a current Primary Chair, Re-enter"
      GoTo redoinput
    Else
       msg = "Auto Action: SET CURRENT Chair's values for " & vbCrLf & _
             "Group, Priority, assigned JCATs and Assistants! " & vbCrLf & _
             "REPLACING (and using values from) CHAIR:" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
             "Chair # " & rs.CHAIRNUM & ":   " & rs!FNAME & " " & rs!LNAME & vbCrLf & _
             "IS THIS CORRECT?"
       If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbNo Then
          GoTo redoinput
       Else
       ' -------------- DO THE WORK  ---------------
         Me.GROUP = rs!GROUP
         Me.PRIORITY = rs!PRIORITY
         Me.LOCATION = rs!LOCATION
         PrevPrimChair = userinput  ' Leave it 0 up to now
         With JudgeTypesRS
            If InStr(1, rs!ChrNote, "PrevJCAT(s)= ") <= 0 Or IsNull(rs!ChrNote) Then
               rs.Edit
               rs!ChrNote = "PrevJCAT(s)= " & rs!ChrNote ' Put at front
               rs.Update
            End If
            .MoveFirst
            Do While Not .EOF
              If !CHAIRNUM = PrevPrimChair Then
                .Edit
                !CHAIRNUM = Me.CHAIRNUM
                If InStr(1, rs!ChrNote, !JCAT) <= 0 Then
                   rs.Edit
                   rs!ChrNote = "PrevJCAT(s)= " & !JCAT & ", " & _
                      Mid(rs!ChrNote, 13, Len(rs!ChrNote) - 12)
                   rs.Update
                End If
                .Update
              End If
              .MoveNext
            Loop
         End With
         Call UpdateJCATs  'Fills in the assigned jcats
         'Need to set the prevprimchair STATUS = null
         rs.Edit
         rs!Chairs_STATUS = Null
         rs.Update
         workdone = True
       End If
    End If
  End If
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox IIf(workdone, Err.Description, "Work Not Done" & vbCrLf _
    & Err.Description), , Title
End Function
' JS - Verify/Set Current Prim Chair Grp,Prior.,JCATS (New setup, manual?)
Private Function SubJS() As Boolean
  ' This routine is not used as of 011502
  On Error GoTo SubError
  SubJS = True
  MsgBox "You should now Verify and/or Set GROUP,PRIORITY, & JCATS", , Title
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Function
' JB - Msg, Best to set Other Prim Chair Active(esle clrgrpjcats)
Private Function SubJB() As Boolean
  On Error GoTo SubError
  SubJB = True
  'Test if this primary chair has assignments.
  Dim hasassigns As Boolean
  hasassigns = False
  With JudgeTypesRS
    .MoveFirst
    Do While Not .EOF
       If !CHAIRNUM = Me.CHAIRNUM Then hasassigns = True
      .MoveNext
    Loop
  End With
  If hasassigns Then
    msg = "THIS CHAIR HAS ASSIGNMENTS!" & vbCrLf & _
          "You must re-assign the JCATs to other Chair(s)!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
          "ASSIGN ALL JCATS TO 'ONE' DIFFERENT CHAIR?"
    If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbYes Then '  reassign all to replacement
      msg = "BEST METHOD TO RE_ASSIGN IS:" & vbCrLf & _
        " * SET an inactive or new PRIMARY Chair ACTIVE  OR..." & vbCrLf & _
        " * CHANGE an existing ASSISTANT Chair to PRIMARY and ACTIVE." & vbCrLf & _
        " * Then, follow the AUTO RE-ASSIGN process!" & vbCrLf & _
        "    (The program does the work!)" & vbCrLf & _
        "Hint: After [yes], press [Esc] key to reset field." & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
        "DO YOU WANT TO RE-ASSIGN AS SUGGESTED ABOVE?"
      If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbYes Then  ' abort the change
        SubJB = False ' user does not want to change the status or type
      Else  ' yes, abort the change
        GoTo DoRemove
      End If
    Else  ' Manual reassign
DoRemove:
      MsgBox "The assigned JCATS will now be un-assigned! " & vbCrLf & _
             "Be sure these JCATs are re-assigned" & vbCrLf & _
             "soon to Active, Primary Chairs!", , Title
      With JudgeTypesRS
        .MoveFirst
        Do While Not .EOF
          If !CHAIRNUM = Me.CHAIRNUM Then
           .Edit
           !CHAIRNUM = Null
           .Update
          End If
        .MoveNext
        Loop
      End With
      Me.tbJCATS = ""
    End If
  End If
  Exit Function
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Function
Private Sub cbASSISTING_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  If Me.Type = "P" Then
    MsgBox "Primary Chairs do not assist other chairs!" & vbCrLf & _
           "Leave blank or change this Chair to type 'A'ssistant first." _
           & vbCrLf & "Hint: Press [Esc] to clear field", , Title
    Cancel = True
  End If
End Sub

Private Sub cbASSISTING_Enter()
  RequeryCBs
End Sub
Private Sub cbFindName_AfterUpdate()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If (IsNull(cbFindName)) Then
     'MsgBox "Nothing Selected!"
     'cbFindStudent.SetFocus
     Exit Sub
  End If
  'Nextline (vs setrs,me.bookmark=rs.bookmark) allows updates in
  ' Form.BeforeUpdate
  ' Replace 'First' 'Name' next line. Do not replace in 2nd line Find Next
  Me.Recordset.FindFirst "CHAIRNUM = " & Str(Me![cbFindName]) ' Edit This?
  Me.cbFindName = Null ' No Edits or replacement on this line
  Me.CHAIRNUM.SetFocus ' Replace / Edit this
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbFindNum_AfterUpdate()
   ' Find the record that matches the control.
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If (IsNull(cbFindNum)) Then
       'MsgBox "Nothing Selected!"
       'cbFindNum.SetFocus
       Exit Sub
   End If
  'Nextline (vs setrs,me.bookmark=rs.bookmark) allows updates in
  '  Form.BeforeUpdate
  Me.Recordset.FindFirst "CHAIRNUM = " & Str(Me![cbFindNum]) 'Edit This?
  Me.cbFindNum = Null
  Me.CHAIRNUM.SetFocus ' Replace / Edit this
Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub RequeryCBs()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   If DidDelete = True Then
     Me.cbFindNum.Requery
     ' Do not replace string name in this or next line - Find Next
     Me.cbFindName.Requery
     DidDelete = False
   End If
   If DidAdd = True Then
     Me.cbFindNum.Requery
     ' Do not replace string name in this or next line - Find Next
     Me.cbFindName.Requery
     DidAdd = False
   End If
   Me.cbASSISTING.Requery
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbFindNum_Enter()
   Call RequeryCBs
End Sub
Private Sub cbFindName_Enter()
   Call RequeryCBs
End Sub
Private Sub cbJudge_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   ' Find the record that matches the new PID
   Dim rs As Object
   Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
   rs.FindFirst "[JUN] = " & cbJudge.Value 'Edit this PID of selected person
   If rs.NoMatch Then
      ' Find just continue
     If Not Me.NewRecord Then
     ' I have no idea why the combo box does not reset it's display to
     ' the origional selected item. It does in protocols.  In protocols the
     ' bound item is in the 'primary top level table'. Here it is not
     ' perhaps that is the reason!  anyway had to add hint as workaround.
     ' Notice the rest of the form data is reset, just not the selection!
     ' Now... Added Form.timer work around
     'msg = "HINT: Press [Esc] once to restore)" & vbCrLf &
       msg = "Normally a CHAIRNUM keeps the same JUN, or said" & vbCrLf & _
             "another way - A Judge keeps the same CHAIRNUM" & vbCrLf & _
             "Do you Really Want to " & vbCrLf & _
             "CHANGE THE JUDGE/CHAIRNUMBER relationship?"
       If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
         Me.JUN = cbJudge.OldValue
         Cancel = True
         'Form.TimerInterval = 50 ' 10 ms gives time for Cancel=true code to work
       End If
     End If
   Else
      ' Edit this (next line)
      msg = "This Judge is already a Chair!" & vbCrLf & _
            "Completing this change will cause duplicate Chairs!" & vbCrLf & _
            "Highly recommended you click [No]!" & vbCrLf & _
            "Hint: Press [Esc] key after selecting [NO] " & vbCrLf & _
            "CREATE A DUPLICATE JUDGE?"
       If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
         Cancel = True
         Exit Sub
       End If
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbJudge_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
   ' Do this code for new adds for Job type Tables (judges, students etc)
   ' If the Person is not the first entry (required)
   ' this may not be needed.
   ' Use this area to set up other fields after the person entry
   On Error GoTo SubError
   ' Edit This
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbJudge_NotInList(newdata As String, Response As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Chairs_STATUS_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  Dim test As String
  Dim test2 As String
  test = IIf(IsNull(Me.Chairs_STATUS), "", Me.Chairs_STATUS)
  test2 = IIf(IsNull(LastSTATUS), "", LastSTATUS)
  PrevPrimChair = 0
  If test <> test2 Then  ' can not compare strings and nulls
    If DoReassign(True) = False Then ' user does not want to change Status
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
    End If
  End If
  LastSTATUS = Me.Chairs_STATUS
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Chairs_STATUS_Enter()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  LastSTATUS = Me.Chairs_STATUS
  If Me.NewRecord Then
    'required for auto assign of JCATS to work (record must exist)
    DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acRecordsMenu, acSaveRecord, , acMenuVer70
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Chairs_STATUS_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
' NOTE: Setting to upper case is mostly for visual consistency. It is not
'       required for finding and matching as is was in dBase!
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If IsNull(Me.Chairs_STATUS) Then Exit Sub ' no need to check
    If Asc(Me.Chairs_STATUS) <> Asc(UCase(Me.Chairs_STATUS)) Then ' do only not ucase
        Me.Chairs_STATUS = UCase(Me.Chairs_STATUS)
    End If
    LastSTATUS = Me.Chairs_STATUS
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub TYPE_beforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  PrevPrimChair = 0
  If Me.Type <> LastTYPE Then
    If DoReassign(False) = False Then ' user says do not change
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
    End If
  End If
  LastTYPE = Me.Type
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub TYPE_Enter()
  LastTYPE = Me.Type
End Sub
Private Sub Type_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
' NOTE: Setting to upper case is mostly for visual consistency. It is not
'       required for finding and matching as is was in dBase!
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If IsNull(Me.Type) Then Exit Sub   ' no need to check
    If Asc(Me.Type) <> Asc(UCase(Me.Type)) Then ' do only not ucase
        Me.Type = UCase(Me.Type)
    End If
    LastTYPE = Me.Type
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Current()  'Here for each time a new record is selected
   On Error GoTo SubError
   TouchedUndo = False
   If Me.NewRecord Then ' Or IsNull(Me.PROTOID) Then
      'Me.Fieldnam.Locked = False ' Allow a field to be changed. Edit This
      Me.tbJCATS = ""
      Me.tbRecord = 1 + Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      Me.tbNumRec = 1 + Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      DidAdd = True
      InAdd = True
   Else
      Call RequeryCBs ' If
      Call UpdateJCATs
      DeleteLast = False
      InAdd = False
      Me.tbNumRec = Me.Recordset.RecordCount
      Me.tbRecord = Me.CurrentRecord
      'Me.Fieldnam.Locked = False ' CHANGE this to TRUE to lock. Edit This
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub CHAIRNUM_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer) ' Replace this  Edit This
  'You may not want users to change the key value!
  ' Use this area to warn of changes
  On Error GoTo SubError
  '  Warn if about to change
  If Not IsNull(Me.CHAIRNUM) And TouchedUndo = False _
        And InAdd = False Then ' Replace /Edit This
    ' Replace or Edit This  (next line)
    If Me.CHAIRNUM <> Me.CHAIRNUM.OldValue Then
      msg = "You are about to change the Key Value CHAIRNUM!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Although OK, Be sure you want to do this!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Tables with references to this Chair will be updated if" & vbCrLf & _
          "Referential Integrity & Cascade Update are both set." & vbCrLf & _
          " (Hint: Press [Esc] key after selecting [NO]) " & vbCrLf & _
          "CHANGE CHAIRNUM? "
      If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
       Cancel = True
       Exit Sub
      End If
    End If
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_BeforeUpdate(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Edit This   Do any checks here.  For Example
  If Me.CHAIRNUM > 999 Or Me.CHAIRNUM < 1 Or IsNull(Me.CHAIRNUM) Then
      MsgBox "CHAIRNUM Must be between 1 and 999!", , Title
      Cancel = True
  End If
  ' Edit This  Do any updates for example
  Dim tpstr As String
  tpstr = IIf(IsNull(Me.TP), "", Me.TP)
  Call setFieldTP(tpstr, "RJ")         ' Edit this
  Me.TP = tpstr
  Me.LAST_CHG = Format(Now, "mm/dd/yy")
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Delete(Cancel As Integer)
   ' This plus Sub Form_BeforeDelConfirm work to ALWAYS show a delete message
   ' Even if user has turned off the warning messages.
   On Error GoTo SubError
   msg = "DELETE RECORD?"
   If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
   End If
   DidDelete = True   ' Indicate did a delete of the record
   tCN = Me.CHAIRNUM
   TLN = IIf(IsNull(Me.LNAME), "", Me.LNAME)
   TFN = IIf(IsNull(Me.FNAME), "", Me.FNAME)
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_BeforeDelConfirm(Cancel As Integer, Response As Integer)
   ' This suppresses the system confirmation message, I give message in
   ' Sub Form_Delete (
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Response = acDataErrContinue
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_AfterDelConfirm(STATUS As Integer)
  ' Use this to delete other related records (i.e. Persons) BUT,
  ' You must do :me.Application.SetOption "Confirm RecordChanges",True
  '   Or this Routine is NEVER CALLED!
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Call ScifairLog("Del Chair CHAIRNUM: ", tCN, " " & TLN & _
                                          ", " & TFN)
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Dirty(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Edit This  You can use this area to update fields that change anytime
  ' and edit is done to the record - i.e. LastUpdate fields
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub UpdateJCATs()
  On Error GoTo SubError
    With JudgeTypesRS
      .MoveFirst
      Me.tbJCATS = ""
      Do While Not .EOF
        If !CHAIRNUM = Me.CHAIRNUM Then
          Me.tbJCATS = Me.tbJCATS & !JCAT & vbCrLf
        End If
        .MoveNext
      Loop
    End With
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub cbAddJCAT_AfterUpdate()
  'On Error GoTo suberror
  If Me.Type = "P" Then
    Dim rs As Object
    Set rs = Me.Recordset.Clone
    With JudgeTypesRS
      .MoveFirst
      .FindFirst "JCAT = '" & cbAddJCAT.Value & "'"
      If .NoMatch Then
        MsgBox "Not Found", , Title
        Exit Sub
      Else
        msg = "Add " & !JCAT & "?"
        If Not IsNull(!CHAIRNUM) Then
           rs.FindFirst "CHAIRNUM = " & !CHAIRNUM
           If Not .NoMatch Then
              msg = "Move " & !JCAT & " from " & rs.FNAME & " " & rs.LNAME & _
                  " (" & rs!CHAIRNUM & ")"
           End If
        End If
      End If
      If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo, Title) = vbYes Then
         If InStr(1, rs!ChrNote, "PrevJCAT(s)= ") <= 0 Or IsNull(rs!ChrNote) Then
            rs.Edit
            rs!ChrNote = "PrevJCAT(s)= " & rs!ChrNote ' Put at front
            rs.Update
         End If
        .Edit
        !CHAIRNUM = Me.CHAIRNUM
        If InStr(1, rs!ChrNote, !JCAT) <= 0 Then
           rs.Edit
           rs!ChrNote = "PrevJCAT(s)= " & !JCAT & ", " & _
                Mid(rs!ChrNote, 13, Len(rs!ChrNote) - 12)
           rs.Update
        End If
        .Update
        .Requery
      Else
        Exit Sub
      End If
    End With
    Me.cbAddJCAT.Requery
    'Me.cbRemoveJCAT.Requery
       
    'Me.Requery
    Call UpdateJCATs
  Else
    MsgBox "Set JCATS for Chair type 'P' (Primary) Only"
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
' not used as of now
'Private Sub cbRemoveJCAT_AfterUpdate()
'  On Error GoTo suberror
'   With JudgeTypesRS
'      .FindFirst "JCAT = '" & cbAddJCAT.Value & "'"
'      If Not .NoMatch Then
'        .Edit
'        !CHAIRNUM = Null
'        .Update
'      End If
'      .Requery
'   End With
'  Me.cbAddJCAT.Requery
'  Me.cbRemoveJCAT.Requery
'  'Me.Requery
'  Call UpdateJCATs
'  Exit Sub
'suberror:
'  MsgBox Err.Description
'End Sub

Private Sub Judges_STATUS_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
' NOTE: Setting to upper case is mostly for visual consistency. It is not
'       required for finding and matching as is was in dBase!
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If IsNull(Me.Judges_STATUS) Then Exit Sub   ' no need to check
    If Asc(Me.Judges_STATUS) <> Asc(UCase(Me.Judges_STATUS)) Then ' do only not ucase
        Me.Judges_STATUS = UCase(Me.Judges_STATUS)
    End If
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Load()  'OK'
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Add any Code Required prior to Form showing on Screen Edit This
  ' This is Required If any Work is done in me.AfterDeleteConfirm_Click Action
  HoldCRCState = Me.Application.GetOption("Confirm Record Changes")
  Me.Application.SetOption "Confirm Record Changes", True
  Me.Rev.Caption = RevisionDate
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  ' Open any Tables or SQL queries here
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Title = "Chairs Edit"     'Edit This
  DidDelete = False
  DidAdd = False
  DoCrLf = False
  ' The next statements give a type mismatch error unless or until
  ' I fixed the priority of references in the Visual Basic Tools option.
  ' Sequence must be:
  ' Visual Basic for Applications
  ' Microsoft Access 9.0 Library
  ' Microsoft Office 9.0 Library
  ' OLE Automation
  ' Microsoft DAO 3.6 Obj Lib
  ' Microsoft Visual Basic of Application Extensibility 5.3
  '  Others as needed
  ' Open any Needed Recordsets Edit This
  'criteria = "SELECT ..."
  Set JudgeTypesRS = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("JudgeTypes", dbOpenDynaset)
  Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Close()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   ' Close Any Needed Recordsets  Edit This
   JudgeTypesRS.Close
   Me.Application.SetOption "Confirm Record Changes", HoldCRCState
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnFirst_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, _
                              x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description 'Normally No Message is needed
End Sub
Private Sub btnFirst_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnFirst_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acFirst
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnFirst_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnFirst_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnFirst_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrev_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, _
                                                  x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description 'Normally No Message is needed
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrev_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnPrev_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnPrev_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnPrev_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnPrev_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnNext_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, _
x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description 'Normally No Message is needed
End Sub
Private Sub btnNext_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnNext_Click
    If Me.CurrentRecord = Me.Recordset.RecordCount Then
       MsgBox "End of Data!"
       ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
       Exit Sub
    End If
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acNext
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnNext_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnNext_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnNext_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnLast_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, _
                                            x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description 'Normally No Message is needed
End Sub
Private Sub btnLast_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnLast_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acLast
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnLast_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnLast_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnLast_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnAdd_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnAdd_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acNewRec
    On Error Resume Next
    ' Set Focus on Desired First Entry Box here Edit This
    Me.CHAIRNUM.SetFocus
Exit_btnAdd_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnAdd_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnAdd_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelete_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, _
                                    x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description 'Normally No Message is needed
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelete_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnDelete_Click
      DeleteLast = False
      If Me.Recordset.RecordCount = Me.CurrentRecord Then  'last record
        DeleteLast = True
      End If
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 8, , acMenuVer70  'Select Record
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 6, , acMenuVer70  'Delete
      If DeleteLast = True Then ' Bill Gates goes to add new record-Not Desired
        'On Error Resume Next '
        'DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
        'On Error GoTo Err_btnDelete_Click
        DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
        DeleteLast = False
      End If
      On Error Resume Next ' Skip all messages re not able to focus
      ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnDelete_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnDelete_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnDelete_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnSave_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description 'Normally No Message is needed
End Sub
Private Sub btnSave_Click()
    ' Save the Indexed value so can move to it after save
    Dim SvSCH_CODE As Long   ' Replace this else Edit This
    On Error GoTo Err_btnSave_Click
    ' Check that at least the minimum is done. NOTE: any code put here will not
    ' be executed if the user does menu save Record, Shift Enter or moves to
    ' Another record - so... This is just to 'Pre-Warn'
    If IsNull(Me.CHAIRNUM) Then ' Replace This else Edit This
      MsgBox "Must Enter CHAIRNUM! (or Undo)", vbOKOnly, Title 'Rpl/ Edit This
      On Error Resume Next
      ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
      Exit Sub
    Else
      SvSCH_CODE = Me.CHAIRNUM  ' Replace both Else Edit This
    End If
    If InAdd Then  ' Only save if in add mode
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acRecordsMenu, acSaveRecord, , acMenuVer70
    End If
    ' The next command does a Remove Filter Sort which in effect requeries
    DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acRecordsMenu, 3, , acMenuVer70 'RemFiltSort
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
    Me.Recordset.FindFirst "CHAIRNUM = " & SvSCH_CODE  'Replace Both /Edit This
Exit_btnSave_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnSave_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnSave_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnUndo_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnUndo_Click
   If IsNull(Me.CHAIRNUM) And IsNull(Me.cbJudge) Then
     DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
     Exit Sub
   End If
    DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
Exit_btnUndo_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnUndo_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnUndo_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnUndo_MouseMove(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
   TouchedUndo = True
End Sub
